bibl.title: Eldon Jay EPP and Gordon D. FEE, Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism
bibl.seg: EPP Eldon Jay, A Continuing Interlude in New Testament Textual Criticism?
Eldon Jay EPP and Gordon D. FEE, Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism = Studies and Documents. 45 (Grand Rapids, Michigan, 1993) pp. 109-123.
